'''vilverin''' "butterfly", 
==Etymology==
Derived from a stem [[WIL]] "fly, float in air"<ref>[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]] p.398</ref>

According to the examples found in the essay ''[[Quendi and Eldar]]'' [[Helge Fauskanger]] observes that Quenya ''w'' becomes ''u'' in Telerin, instead of ''v'' and ''vilverin'' should actually read *''vilvarin''
